name: WKInterfacePicker
desc: An interface element that presents a scrolling list of items for the user to choose from.

items.name: func setItems([WKPickerItem]?)
items.desc: Sets the list of items displayed by the picker.

items.name: class WKPickerItem
items.desc: A single item in a picker interface.

items.name: func setSelectedItemIndex(Int)
items.desc: Selects the specified item in the list.

items.name: func setCoordinatedAnimations([WKInterfaceObject & WKImageAnimatable]?)
items.desc: Sets the interface objects that should coordinate their own animations with the picker.

items.name: func focus()
items.desc: Configures the picker to receive input from the Digital Crown.

items.name: func resignFocus()
items.desc: Removes focus from the picker, causing it to stop receiving input from the Digital Crown.
